newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish central bank offers repo at unchanged rate.
newsitem.headline: Danish central bank offers repo at unchanged rate.

text.p: Denmark's central bank said on Thursday it offered to enter two-week state paper repurchase agreements at a fixed yield of 3.70 percent, unchanged from the previous two-week offer.
The bank steers money market rates and liquidity through its 14-day certificates of deposit (CDs) deals and state paper repos.
The central bank discount and key deposit rates were unchanged at 3.25 percent.
